mercenary.name: mercenary
passives: Can now equip the Empire Longbow and Bretonnian Sword & Shield.

talents.name: Limb-Splitter
changes: Now increases cleave power by 80%.

talents.name: Helborg’s Tutelage
changes: The guaranteed critical hits now only apply to melee attacks.
Critical hits can still occur randomly.

talents.name: Reikland Reaper
changes: Increases the power by 10% for every player when paced strikes is active.

talents.name: Enhanced Training
changes: Hitting 3 or more enemies increases power by 20% for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Black Market Supplies
changes: Every 6th melee kill (2nd for shotguns) reloads Kruber’s ranged weapon.
Every 15th melee kill (10th for shotguns) makes Kruber’s next ranged attack consume no ammo.

talents.name: On Yer Feet, Mates!
changes: Now also frees allies from ledges, hooks and revives allies waiting for rescue.
Whenever an ally is downed, 40% of Kruber’s ultimate cooldown is refunded.
Revived allies now receive 50% increased stamina regeneration, 40% block cost reduction, block angle increased by 80%, 3 stamina shields, and significantly increased power for 2 seconds.

huntsman.name: huntsman
passives: Gives a buff based on the ranged weapon Huntsman is wielding:
Handgun: +25% reload speed.
Blunderbuss: +20% crit power and +7.5% crit chance.
Repeater Handgun: -40% reload speed, -20% damage, +1 extra projectile fired with every shot.
Aura size increased to 10.
Can now equip the Bretonnian Sword & Shield.

talents.name: Keep It Coming
changes: Every 7 seconds, Huntsman gets a free shot.

talents.name: Blend In
changes: Reduced duration from 6 to 4 seconds.

talents.name: Concealed Strikes
changes: Increases the power against the armor type of the first enemy hit by 30% for 10 seconds.

foot-knight.name: foot knight
passives: Valiant Charge now has the highest stagger value in the game, Other, non-Foot Knight, stagger sources will not overwrite it.
New additional passive: Living Bulwark. Foot Knight now breaks shields with every melee attack, Stormvermin shields can only be broken with heavy melee attacks.
Protective Presence: Aura size increased to 10.
Can now equip the Tuskgor Spear, Empire Longbow and Bretonnian Sword & Shield.

talents.name: Have at Thee!
changes: Now also applies when staggering specials and bosses.

talents.name: Rock of the Reikland
changes: No longer doubles Protective Presence’s aura size.
Now grants two additional stamina shields instead of 20% block cost reduction.

talents.name: That’s Bloody Teamwork
changes: Replaced the additional damage reduction aura with an aura that increases all healing received: Stacks up to 15% increased healing received (5% per ally within 10 units).
Protective Presence’s base aura effect (15% damage reduction) is still active.

talents.name: It’s Hero Time
changes: Increases Foot Knight’s cooldown regeneration rate by 333% whilst an ally is incapacitated or downed until the ally is freed or Foot Knight’s ultmitate is ready.
Can stack 3 times.

talents.name: Counter Punch
changes: Every 10 seconds, Foot Knight gains massive stagger and cleave power for his next melee attack.

talents.name: Inspiring Blow
changes: Replaced with new talent “Inspiring Presence”: Increases the amount of wounds for all players by 1.
Foot Knight gains 15% increased cooldown regeneration rate.

talents.name: Numb to Pain
changes: Replaced with new talent “Excruciating Pain”: Every enemy Foot Knight staggers with his ultimate takes 20% more damage for 8 seconds.
This effect does not stack.

grail-knight.name: grail knight
passives: Cooldown regen quest: Increased base value to 20% (up from 10%), improved value now goes up to 30% (up from 20%).
Damage reduction quest: Increased base value to 12% (up from 10%), improved value now goes up to 18% (up from 15%).
Changed proc condition from collecting a tome to scoring 500 headshots.
Health regen quest: Changed proc condition from collecting a grimoire to generating 2000 health (green HP or temp HP).
Strength potion quest: Increased the amount of kills required to drop a potion to 300 on Cataclysm 3 (up from 200).
Can now equip the Tuskgor Spear and Halberd.

talents.name: Virtue of the Ideal
changes: Changed to 5 stacks of 6% power (from 3 stacks of 8% power).

talents.name: Virtue of Heroism
changes: Now increases melee damage, ultimate included, based on Grail Knight’s current health.

talents.name: Virtue of the Penitent
changes: Now only grants one additional quest instead of two.

talents.name: Virtue of Stoicism
changes: Now stores up to 6 instances of damage taken instead of just one.
Conversion of health lost and regained as temp HP is reduced to 25% (down from 50%).

talents.name: Virtue of Discipline
changes: Replaced with new talent “Virtue of Agility”: Increases dodge distance by 20%.

talents.name: Virtue of Audacity
changes: The second stab now deals the same damage as the first.

talents.name: Virtue of Confidence
changes: Reduced damage but significantly increased damage cleave.

weapons.name: Bretonnian longsword
changes: Swapped the damage profiles of Light 1 and Light 2 to address L1-block cancel shenanigans.
Light 2: Increased headshot multiplier from 1.5 to 2.
Heavy 3: Increased headshot multiplier from 0.75 to 1.29.
Push attack: Now uses the same damage profile as Light 3.

weapons.name: Bretonnian Sword & Shield
changes: All attacks except the shield bashes (Light 3, Heavy 2) now have 10% crit chance.
Light 1: Changed to be an overhead.
Light 2: Changed to be a stab.
Light 3: Removed.
Heavy 1: Changed to be a shield-bash.
Heavy 2: Changed to be stab.
Heavy 3: Changed to be an overhead, downward swing.
Push: Now chains into Heavy 2.
Push attack: Now a shield-bash.

weapons.name: Executioner Sword
changes: Chaining from Heavy 1 into Heavy 2 is now faster.
Reduced dodge count from 3 to 2.
Light attacks: Increased attack speed by 10% to 14%.

weapons.name: Greatsword
changes: Added a new attack chain with two attacks: two light overheads.
The Push Attack can now chain into two additional light overhead attacks.
Push-attacking is the only way of starting the new attack chain.
Both light overheads have the same damage profile as the Push Attack.

Light 1:Changed animation into that of Bretonnian Longsword’s Light 1, Added 10% crit chance, Reduced overall damage against the 1st enemy cleaved by 0.025, from 0.25 to 0.225, Reduced overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.095, from 0.22 to 0.125, Reduced overall damage against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.08, from 0.18 to 0.1.

Heavy attacks: Now breaks shields, Reduced overall damage against the 1st enemy cleaved by 0.05, from 0.5 to 0.45, Reduced overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.1, from 0.35 to 0.25, Reduced overall damage against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.1, from 0.25 to 0.15, Reduced overall damage against the 4th enemy cleaved by 0.055, from 0.18 to 0.125.

Push attack: Increased attack speed by 20%, Increased armour and super-armor damage by 20%, Now chains into two overhead light attacks that both have the same damage profile as the Push Attack, Increased Armour damage by 0.3, from 0.5 to 0.8, Increased Monster damage by 0.25, from 1.5 to 1.75, Reduced Stagger against Armoured enemies by 0.4, from 1 to 0.6, Increased Armour Crit damage by 0.3, from 0.5 to 0.8, Increased Monster Crit damage by 1, from 1.5 to 2.5, Reduced Crit Stagger against Armoured enemies by 0.2, Reduced Crit Stagger against Berserkers/Monks by 0.5, Now counts as a Light attack, Increased headshot multiplier from 0.75 to 2, Reduced overall damage against the 1st enemy cleaved by 0.25, from 0.65 to 0.4, Reduced overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.1, from 0.2 to 0.1.

weapons.name: Great Hammer
changes: Light 3: Increased stagger significantly.

Heavy attacks: Increased damage cleave by 0.2, from 0.3(8.95 in-game) to 0.5(14.92 in-game), Increased overall damage against 1st enemy cleaved by 0.15, from 0.275 to 0.425, Reduced overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.05, from 0.35 to 3, Increased overall damage against 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.1, from 0.075 to 0.075, Increased infantry crit damage from 1 to 1.2, Decreased Armour damage by 0.135, from 0.5 to 0.365, Reduced Berserker/Monk damage by 0.25, from 0.75 to 0.5.
Push attack: Added 12.5% crit chance.

weapons.name: Halberd
changes: Increased dodge distance from 0% to 7.5%.
Light 2: Increased Berserker/Monk damage by 27%.
Heavy 1: Increased Berserker/Monk damage by 33%, Increased cleave by 16%, Increased stagger from 0.05 to 0.75
Heavy 2: Reduced Super-armour damage by 15%, Increased Berserker/Monk damage by 15%, Decreased charge up time slightly, Added armor-sliding.
Push attack: Increased armor damage by 38%, Reduced Super-armour damage by 10%.
Weapon special (new): Wide sweep attack with lots of stagger power that breaks shields, Chains into Heavy 2.

weapons.name: Mace
changes: Reduced stamina count from 4.5 shields to 3.
Increased stagger for all attacks.
Increased headshot multipliers slightly for all attacks.
Light attacks: Now break shields.
Light 3: Same damage profile as Light 1.
Heavy 1: Now chains into Light 4.
Heavy 2: Now a horizontal attack.
Push: Increased cost from 1 to 2 stamina.
Weapon special (new): Uppercut with lots of stagger power, Costs 2 stamina (1 shield), has a 2 second cooldown.

weapons.name: Mace & Shield
changes: Weapon special (new): Super shield bash with lots of stagger power, has a 4 second cooldown.

weapons.name: Mace & Sword
changes: Heavy 1: Removed Linesman hit mass count.
Heavy 2: Removed Linesman hit mass count.

weapons.name: 1H Sword
changes: Light 1: Increased overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.015, from 0.21 to 0.225, Reduced overall damage against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.01, from 0.185 to 0.175, Increased Armour damage by 0.3, from 0 to 0.3.
Light 2: Increased overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.015, from 0.21 to 0.225, Reduced overall damage against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.01, from 0.185 to 0.175.
Light 3: Now breaks shields, Increased crit armour damage from 0.75 to 0.8, Increased armour damage by 7%.

Heavy 1: Increased damage cleave by 0.45, from 0.3(8.95 in-game) to 0.75(22.38 in-game), Reduced overall damage against the 1st enemy hit by 0.02, from 0.32 to 0.3, Increased overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.02, from 0.18 to 0.2, Reduced overall stagger against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.03, from 0.18 to 0.15, Reduced overall stagger against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.05, from 0.15 to 0.1, Reduced Armour damage by 0.25, from 0.6 to 0.35.
Heavy 2: Now an overhead attack, Breaks shields. Increased armour damage from 0.5 to 0.75, Increased crit armour damage from 0.5 to 0.65, Reduced time to chain into Light 3 from 0.5 to 0.4.
Push attack: Increased damage against the 2nd and 3rd enemy cleaved by 22% and 29% respectively, Increased headshot multiplier from 1.5 to 2.5.
Push: Increased cost from 1 to 2 stamina.

Weapon special (new): Thrust attack, Has good stagger against most enemies, costs 2 stamina (1 shield), Chains into Light 3, or into Heavy 2, Increased QQ-cancel chain timer by 0.15 seconds, from 0.5 to 0.65 seconds.

weapons.name: Spear & Shield
changes: Can now chain earlier into either Light or Heavy attacks after any of the weapon special attacks.
Light 2: Added Tank hit mass count.
Heavy 1: Added armour-sliding.
Heavy 2: Now uses the Heavy 2’s damage profile from the Elf’s Spear & Shield.

weapons.name: Sword & Shield
changes: Heavy 1: Can now reach a second charge state which has a lot more stagger power but leaves you somewhat open (charge up works similar to Rapier’s heavies).

weapons.name: Tuskgor Spear
changes: Light 1: Increased cleave by 500%, Now breaks shields.
Light 2: Increased attack speed by 25%, Increased armour damage by 15%, Increased cleave by 500%, Now breaks shields, Now chains into Heavy 1.
Light 4: Increased armour damage by 15%, Increased cleave by 500%, Now breaks shields.
Heavy 1: Increased infantry damage by 10%, Increased armour damage by 117%, Increased crit armour damage by 30%, Increased cleave by 500%.

weapons.name: Blunderbuss
changes: Weapon special (new): Fires an armor penetrating bullet that deals heavy single target damage, Little to no cleave and very wide spread to incentivize close range use.

weapons.name: Empire Longbow
changes: Reload time reduced to 0.1, and made the weapon overall faster to use, Increased close range infantry bodyshot damage to kill Assassins with one bodyshot when fully charged or with two bodyshots when partially charged (at 20% Skaven/Chaos, 20% Infantry), Reduced its damage dropoff range (Kruber’s fast sniper for close/mid range).
Weapon special: Enables a second zoom level when aiming down sights.

weapons.name: Handgun
changes: Removed damage drop off.
Increased cleave and added the ability to always cleave through one additional enemy.
Increased reload speed from 1.8s to 1.875s.
Increased Infantry damage by 25%
Increased Super-armour damage by 33%.
Increased Berserker/Monk damage by 67%.
Can no longer shoot through shields without aiming down sights.
Weapon special (new): Enables a second zoom level when aiming down sights.

ranger-veteran.name: ranger veteran
passives: Survivalist: Added an 8 second cooldown to ammo drops, This cooldown can be bypassed by bursting down a specific number of specials within the 8 second window: 4 (Cata 3), 3 (Cata 1), and 2 below.
Added a blue buff icon that shows the cooldown window.
Increased the amount of ammo gained from Survivalist pouches to 15% (from 10%).
Can now equip the Trollhammer Torpedo and Dual Axes.

talents.name: Last Resort
changes: Replaced with new talent Bombardment: Grants a free bomb throw every 120 seconds.

talents.name: Foe-Feller
changes: Replaced with a new version of Ranger’s Parting Gift: Allows to use a healing item for free every 4 minutes, The free heal also heals nearby allies for 15% of their max health and clears wounds when Ranger Veteran heals himself.

talents.name: Drunken Brawler
changes: Ales grant 2.5% attack speed and 4% damage reduction for 4 minutes.
Can stack 5 times.

talents.name: Grungni’s Cunning
changes: Lowered the increasement to ammo gained from Survivalist pouches to 25% (down from 30%).

talents.name: Scavenger
changes: Changed the proc condition: Now drops either a potion or a bomb after killing a specific amount of specials: 11 (Cata 3), 8 (Cata 1), and 6 below.
Chaos Wastes potions have been added to the drop pool with a lower chance.

talents.name: No Dawdling!
changes: Ranged headshots give Bardin 5 stacks.
ranged bodyshots remove 2 stacks.
missed shots do not consume stacks: Every stack increases ranged power by 1%, max 25 stacks.
Still increases movement speed by 10%.

talents.name: Exhilarating Vapours
changes: Replaced with new talent Neutralizing Vapours: Allies within Bardin’s smoke are immune to gas and gain 3 temp HP per second.

talents.name: Surprise Guest
changes: Replaced with new talent “Stimulating Vapours”.
Bardin’s smoke no longer conceals him from enemies, Bardin gains 25% cooldown reduction, 20% increased reload speed, and does not lose ammo when he hits an enemy with a ranged weapon.

talents.name: Ranger’s Parting Gift
changes: Replaced with new talent “Destructive Vapours”.
Bardin applies the effect of the potion he is carrying to his closest ally (needs to have a potion in his inventory).
Allies within Bardin’s smoke gain 1.5 temp HP per second.

ironbreaker.name: iron breaker
passives: New additional perk: Ironbreaker is no longer slowed from being overcharged.
Can now equip the Dual Axes.

talents.name: Under Pressure
changes: Every nearby ally increases stagger power by 15%.

talents.name: Rune-Etched Shield
changes: Grants 10% attack speed, halves the effect of Dwarf-Forged.
Reduces max HP by 10%.

talents.name: Vengeance
changes: Now adds a Vengeance stack every 3 seconds (up to 8 stacks).
When proc’ed, grants 4% attack speed per stack for 10 seconds.
Ironbreaker is immune to friendly fire while Gromril Armour is active.

talents.name: Miner’s Rhythm
changes: Every 10 seconds, Ironbreaker’s next heavy attack will taunt enemies in close proximity for 4 seconds.
Does not proc when Impenetrable is active.
Can taunt bosses when Oi! Wazzok! is selected as well.

talents.name: Booming Taunt
changes: Taunt duration reduced to 12.5 seconds (down from 15 seconds).

slayer.name: slayer
passives: Added Adrenalin Surge with reduced effectiveness to Trophy Hunter:
Ultimate cooldown rate is increased by 150% (down from 200%) when at max Trophy Hunter stacks.
Leap: Old Crunch! stagger level is baseline now for Slayer’s Leap.
Using the CB toggle keybind forces Slayer to always jump when activating Leap, no matter the distance.

talents.name: A Thousand Cuts
changes: Merged with Skull-Splitter to create new talent “A Thousand-Spliter”:
Wielding two 1-handed weapons increases attack speed by 10%.
Wielding two 2-handed weapons increases power by 20% (up from 15%).

talents.name: Skull-Splitter
changes: Replaced with new talent “No Fear”:
Increases the power level against armored enemies and bosses by 25%.

talents.name: Hack and Slash
changes: Decreases the mass of enemies by 50%.

talents.name: Adrenaline Surge
changes: Trophy Hunter also increases attack speed by 2.5% per stack.

talents.name: Barge
changes: Increases dodge distance by 20%.

talents.name: (Heavy) Crunch!
changes: Now grants even more stagger power, within a decreased radius.

talents.name: Dawi-Drop
changes: Now grants 75% weapon bonus damage for 3 seconds after ulting.

outcast-engineer.name: outcast engineer
passives: Gunsmith: Added new mechanic: Killing a special or elite with the Crank Gun activates Innovative Recycling, which then allows Engi to regain 12.5% of his max ammo when landing at least 15 shots with the Crank Gun (10 for Gromril-Plated Shot), Has a cooldown of 15 seconds
New perk Added “old Bombardier”: Engi’s bombs get the effect of both regular and incendiary bombs.
Steam-Assisted Crank Gun: Increased Engi’s base ultimate cooldown to 75 seconds, Increased dodge count to 2.

talents.name: Ingenious Ordnance
changes: Replaced with old talent Armour Piercing Slugs.
Non-explosive ranged attacks pierce 1 additional enemy.

talents.name: Combined Arms
changes: Ranged kills increase weapon damage by 2% for 10 seconds.
Max 15 stacks.

talents.name: Full Head of Steam
changes: Grants 15% power at 5 Pressure Stacks instead of attack speed.

talents.name: Perilous Overclock
changes: Killing a special or elite with a ranged weapon grants 10% ultimate cooldown reduction.
Can proc every second.
Pressure stacks are reduced to a maximum of 2.

talents.name: Superior Gaskets
changes: Pressure stacks last for 25 seconds, granting 2.5% attack speed each.
Pressure stacks are reduced to a maximum of 4.

talents.name: Bombardier
changes: Each Crank Gun hit reduces damage taken by 2% for 3 seconds.
Max 25 stacks.

talents.name: Piston Power
changes: Increases movement speed by 10% and dodge distance by 20%.

talents.name: Gromril-Plated Shot
changes: More cleave and ability to attack through shields.
Increased damage to super-armored enemies and bosses.
Increased effective range.
Increased headshot multiplier.
Innovative Ammo Hoppers.
Reduced the bonus to Crank Gun ultimate cooldown to 25%.

weapons.name: Axe & Shield
changes: Light 1: Now has the same damage profile as the Push Attack.
Light 2: Now has the same damage profile as the Push Attack.
Heavy 1: Can now reach a second charge state which has a lot more stagger power but leaves you somewhat open (charge up works similar to Rapier’s heavies).
Push attack: Now a move-tech.

weapons.name: Cog Hammer
changes: It is now possible to buffer heavy attacks.

weapons.name: Dual Axes
changes: Push cost reduced from 2 stamina to 1 (half a shield).
Heavy 1: Chaining into Heavy 2 is now 0.15s faster.
Heavy 2: Attack Speed increase by 14%, Chaining into Heavy 3 is now 0.2s faster.
Heavy 3: Attack Speed increase by 14%.

weapons.name: Dual Hammers
changes: Light attacks: Reduced window to chain into light attacks by 0.2 seconds, from 0.4 to 0.2 seconds.
Light 4: Increased overall damage to 0.3 (from 0.25), Reduced the time to chain into heavy attacks from Light 4 from 1s to 0.8s.

Push attack: Increased headshot multiplier to 2.5 (from 2), Increased Infantry damage to 1.25 (from 1), Increased overall damage to 0.225 (from 0.2), Reduced time to chain into light attacks by 0.12s, from 0.45 to 0.33 seconds.

weapons.name: Great Axe
changes: Light attacks: Increased Armour damage by 0.06, from 0.8 to 0.86.
Light 2: Reduced chain timer by 0.05 seconds, 0.65 to 0.6 seconds.

Heavy attacks: Increased damage cleave and stagger cleave by 0.2, from 0.35 (10.45 in-game) to 0.54289(16.2 in-game), The 1st and 2nd enemy cleaved are dealt increased headshot damage by 0.25, from 0.75 to 1, Reduced stagger and damage cleave to 0.5428(16.2 in-game) from 0.9(26.86), Reduced the overall damage dealt to the 2nd enemy by 0.2, from 0.45 to 0.25, Reduced the overall damage dealt to the 3rd enemy by 0.3, from 0.45 to 0.15, Reduced the overall damage dealt to the 4rd enemy by 0.35, from 0.45 to 0.1.

Push attack: Increased attack speed by 10%, Reduced chain timer by 0.1 seconds, from 0.75 to 0.65 seconds, Increased Infantry damage by 0.2, from 1 to 1.2, Increased Armour damage by 0.8, from 0.3 to 1.1, Increased overall damage against the 2nd cleaved by 0.05, from 0.15 to 0., Increased overall stagger against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.05, from 0.125, to 0.175, Increased overall damage against the 3rd cleaved by 0.05, from 0.1 to 0.15, Increased overall stagger against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.05, from 0.1 to 0.15.

weapons.name: Great Hammer
changes: Light 3: Increased stagger significantly.

Heavy attacks: Increased damage cleave by 0.2, from 0.3(8.95 in-game) to 0.5(14.92 in-game), Increased overall damage against 1st enemy cleaved by 0.15, from 0.275 to 0.425, Reduced overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.05, from 0.35 to 3, Increased overall damage against 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.1, from 0.075 to 0.075, Increased Infantry Crit damage from 1 to 1.2, Decreased Armour damage by 0.135, from 0.5 to 0.365, Reduced Berserker/Monk damage by 0.25, from 0.75 to 0.5.
Push attack: Added 12.5% crit chance.

weapons.name: Hammer & Shield
changes: Weapon special (new):  Super shield bash with lots of stagger power, has a 4 second cooldown.

weapons.name: One-handed Axe
changes: Increased headshot multipliers for all attacks.
Light attacks: Increased attack speed by ~10%, Reduced range slightly, Increased armor damage, berserker damage slightly, Reduced super-armor damage.
Light 3: Increased cleave.
Heavy attacks: Increased super-armor damage, Increased headshot damage significantly, Reduced crit bonus damage.
Push: Increased cost from 1 to 2 stamina.

weapons.name: 1H Hammer
changes: Reduced stamina count from 4.5 shields to 3.
Increased stagger for all attacks.
Heavy 1: Now chains into Light 4.
Heavy 2: Now a horizontal attack.
Push: Increased cost from 1 to 2 stamina.
Weapon special (new): Uppercut with lots of stagger power, Costs 2 stamina (1 shield), has a 2 second cooldown.

weapons.name: War Pick
changes: Light attacks: Now break shields.
Heavy attacks: When fully charged, now explode on hit (use Flaming Flail’s Heavy 1 explosion template).
Push attack: Something is fucked here. This needs checking…

weapons.name: Crossbow
changes: Weapon special (new): Enables a second zoom level when aiming down sights.

weapons.name: Drakefire Pistols
changes: Left click: Holding down left click fires the pistols as fast as quickly pressing left click does, Increased damage cleave from 0.15 (4.48 in-game) to 0.23 (6.86 in-game), Increased heat cost from 2.5 to 4.62.
Dual shot: Now breaks shields, Reduced infantry damage from 1 to 0.5, Increased heat cost from 4.62 to 12.

weapons.name: Grudge-Raker
changes: Increased base ammo capacity from 18 to 20.
Weapon special (new): Fires both barrels at once.

weapons.name: Handgun
changes: Clip size increased from 1 to 2.
Reduced reload time from 1.8s to 1.65s.
Added the ability to always cleave through one additional enemy.
Can no longer shoot through shields without aiming down sights.

weapons.name: Masterwork Pistol
changes: Increased base ammo capacity from 24 to 27.

Left click: Decreased weapon swap time from a total of 0.9s to 0.6s, Now twice as accurate, Increased Super-Armour damage at close range by 0.5, from 0 to 0.5, Increased Mauler headshot damage by 0.8, Increased Chaos Warrior headshot damage by 0.6.
Fast shot: Decreased fire rate by ~33%, Increased Monster damage by 0.4, from 2.1 to 2.5.

weapons.name: Throwing Axes
changes: The time required to begin recalling the axes has been halved. Reduced from 0.5 to 0.25 seconds.
Increased reload speed by 20%.
Swapping weapons after a normal and charged throw can now be done earlier.
Timers have been reduced from 0.6 to 0.4 seconds and from 0.5 to 0.35 seconds respectively.
Charged Throw: Increased headshot multiplier from 1 to 2.

weapons.name: Trollhammer Torpedo
changes: Now uses energy as a resource instead of regular ammo: Max energy pool is 30.
Each shot drains 10 energy. Must have at least 10 energy to shoot.
Each shot incurs a 4 second delay before another shot can be fired.
The energy pool recharges at a rate of 0.5/s (i.e. 1 shot every 20s).
You no longer have to reload actively.
Shifted the main damage from the explosion to the projectile.
Lowered the damage radius of the explosion.
Increased the projectile’s headshot multiplier.
Critical hits deal no bonus damage.

weapons.name: Drakegun
changes: Flame Burst Increased duration.
The increased duration means that the heat cost comes in two intervals, This can blow you up if you are already on high heat.

Charged Flame Stream: Now fires a slow, fireball-like projectile that staggers in a small AoE, The AoE also removes Infantry shields, On direct hit, the projectile destroys banners, any shield and staggers bosses.
Uninterruptible during charge up.
